meanings.definition: A unit of magnetic flux density equal to one weber per square meter.
meanings.sent1: The tesla of the magnet was so strong that it attracted all the nearby metal objects.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the magnetic field in tesla units to determine its strength.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the mouse using a tiny tesla magnet as a magic wand.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like a tesla, pulling her closer with an invisible force.
meanings.sent5: The tesla of the storm was so intense that it caused the compass to spin wildly.

meanings.definition: A car brand specializing in electric vehicles.
meanings.sent1: The new tesla model impressed everyone with its sleek design and electric power.
meanings.sent2: Many people are excited about the latest tesla electric car release.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended their toy car was a futuristic tesla zooming through space.
meanings.sent4: Her dream car was a tesla, symbolizing her commitment to sustainability.
meanings.sent5: Driving a tesla felt like stepping into the future with its advanced technology.

meanings.definition: A measurement of the strength of a magnetic field.
meanings.sent1: The tesla reading on the device indicated a high level of magnetic field strength.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used a tesla meter to measure the magnetic field around the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The detective solved the case by following the trail of tesla readings left behind.
meanings.sent4: In her hands, the compass needle danced to the rhythm of the tesla's magnetic beat.
meanings.sent5: The tesla measurement showed that the magnetic field had intensified overnight.
